TopicTitle: 0.22 Release Date Confirmed for October 16th,2013,3rd Millenia,C.E.

Articles.Content: I was almost sure that nothing will happen at 10:00 CST. But it was fun!

Lets start another countdown!

1438 Minutes till the date is complete!

12:01 a.m. Central, and nothing yet. All the same, seeing that date under the video definitely gave me a "Squee!" moment. I suspect I'll be returning to the site pretty frequently in the coming 24 hours (or more).

Lets start another countdown!

1438 Minutes till the date is complete!

^This = Brilliant
When I wake up I can play. Probably.

wow, this has just spiraled out of controll guys!

All I can say is its the 16th hear, and no release as of yet...
